plot: As the distraught members of a tightknit family come to terms with seeing their father shot to death at his son's graduation, it soon emerges that the hitman is only used by the mob in extreme situations.
title: Reluctant Justice
plot_es: As the distraught members of a tightknit family come to terms with seeing their father shot to death at his son's graduation, it soon emerges that the hitman is only used by the mob in extreme situations.
plot_en: As the distraught members of a tightknit family come to terms with seeing their father shot to death at his son's graduation, it soon emerges that the hitman is only used by the mob in extreme situations.
